example.eg: The bill is going out in today's post.
example.egtrans: 账单已经随同今天的邮件发出了。

example.eg: Can you check today's post for the letter from the bank?
example.egtrans: 你能查看一下今天的邮件里有银行的来信吗？

example.eg: The post is slow in rural areas.
example.egtrans: 农村地区的邮政系统很慢。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 邮政系统, 邮递系统, 邮寄系统

example.eg: Lee was hired for a post in government.
example.egtrans: 李受聘在政府里担任职务。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 工作, 职位, 职务

example.eg: The soldiers were sent to a surveillance post near the front lines.
example.egtrans: 士兵们被派往前线附近的一个监测军事哨岗。

example.eg: The sergeant is respected on this post.
example.egtrans: 这位中士在这个军营很受人尊敬。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 军营, 军队驻扎之地

example.eg: I posted the letter today.
The professor posted the test results in the hallway.
example.egtrans: 教授把考试成绩张贴在过道里。

example.eg: She posted her favorite quote on her profile page.
example.egtrans: 她把自己最喜欢的一句话在个人主页上发布了出来。

example.eg: Last year, Janine helped construct wells at her post in Africa.
The trappers entered the trading post.
The car hit a post.
The ball bounced off the post.
example.egtrans: 球从球门柱上弹了回来。

example.eg: The third post in the thread had the answer he was looking for.
example.egtrans: 话题的第三条回帖就有他要的答案。

dsense.name: post
dsense.guideword: (rod used to repair tooth structure) (用于修复牙齿结构)

example.eg: The dentist fitted her with a post to keep the crown stable.
On Sundays I enjoy a post-lunch stroll in the park.  The country experienced an economic boom in the postwar years.
example.egtrans: 周日吃完午饭后，我会去公园里散个步。战后数年中，这个国家的经济取得了高速发展。

example.eg: The boys posted the fence with concert advertisements.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在...上贴满广告, 在...上贴满告示

example.eg: The company posted the job vacancies in the newspaper.
The visiting team posted a goal in the first half.
The business posted a profit.
Post today's numbers in the general ledger.
The enlisted man was posted to a sniper unit near the town.
example.egtrans: 这位应征入伍的士兵被派遣到了小镇附近的一个狙击小队中。

example.eg: She was posted from headquarters to a field office.
example.egtrans: 她被调离了总部，分配到一个外地办事处工作。

example.eg: The manager posted up the team selection in the changing room an hour before the game.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 张贴, 公布, 贴出

example.eg: Can you either fax it to me or send it by post?
You should install the fence posts in postholes that are deep enough to go below the frostline.
Pete won some money because he bet on the horse that was first-past-the-post.
First-past-the-post is the electoral system used to elect parliament in the UK.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 东奔西跑, 四处奔波

dsense.name: from pillar to post
dsense.guideword: figurative (from one bad situation to another)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 四处碰壁, 走投无路

example.eg: The general post office is located in the neighborhood of Chelsea.
The football player danced under the goalpost.
The cowboy tied his horse to the hitching post outside the saloon and went in for a beer.

dsense.name: in the mail, also UK: in the post

example.eg: My application is in the mail, so you should be receiving it soon.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 寄出去的，在邮递过程中的

example.eg: The street was lined with trees and lampposts.

dsense.name: listening post
dsense.guideword: (position for obtaining information on an enemy)

example.eg: The intelligence services set up secret listening posts behind enemy lines.
The mailbox is emptied twice a day.
The army has set up a series of observation posts.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 观测点, 观察所, 观察所

example.eg: The parcel post receipt is proof that the delivery has been carried out.
She sent a picture postcard of the Alps to her mother.
The thief sits in jail because no one would post bail for him.
Don't forget to send me a postcard.
Entries for the competition should be sent on a postcard to the following address.
Analysis of the results of the experiment were completed post hoc.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在此之后, 发生在这之后

example.eg: The meeting commenced at three o'clock, post meridiem.
I'm going to the post office to send this parcel to my brother.
example.egtrans: 我要去邮局把这个包裹寄给我哥哥。

dsense.name: Post Script, post script
dsense.guideword: (P.S.: addition to a letter) (信函后追加额外信息)

example.eg: James had added a Post Script at the end of his letter.
The scheme is intended to address the specific needs of post-secondary students.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 第三级的, 专科以上的, 专科以上的

example.eg: The patient was suffering from post-accident shock.
The company produces post-consumer recycled plastic products.

dsense.name: Post-it note, post-it note, Post-it, Post-it note

example.eg: I left a Post-it note on the fridge door, reminding Anna to buy some milk.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 绝经后的妇女, 后真相的

example.eg: What is the postcode for your home in London?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 邮政编码, 邮递区号

example.eg: If you haven't already explained the delay to the boss, I suggest you do so posthaste - or there'll be trouble!
Many post-industrial cities have suffered an economic decline.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 后工业化的, 工业社会后的

example.eg: The postmortem showed death by natural causes.
The coach organized a postmortem to discuss why the team lost.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 事后分析, 事后调查
死后的, 死后发生的

dsense.name: postmortem examination, also UK: post-mortem examination

example.eg: They don't know how he died – that's why they're doing a post-mortem examination.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 验尸, 尸体解剖检查

example.eg: When the hospital discharged Susan, they gave her information regarding her post-operative care at home.
Medical advice is that it is best for breastfeeding to continue until at least six months postpartum, if possible.
Post-war Japan experienced tremendous economic growth.
We recommend that valuable items be sent by registered mail.  I'd like to send this parcel by registered post, please.

dsense.name: staging post, staging area
dsense.guideword: (any area of assembly before setting off)

dsense.name: telephone pole, telegraph pole, telegraph post

example.eg: I've heard there's a vacant post in this company.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 空缺的职位, 空着的职务
